children.text: Click the button to go to the level that's indicated by the NextSceneZone's NextScene string variable
Click the button to go to the level that's indicated by the NextSceneZone's NextScene string variable
If the player is overlapping the next scene zone, set the card docks & the card's visibility & collisions to enabled
If both types of Cards Docked variables are equal or greater than 1 (the amount you're allowed to choose), then set the button & it's visibility to enabled
Click the button to go to the level that's indicated by the NextSceneZone's NextScene string variable
If the cardsDocked variables are not equal to the correct amount, make the button invisible, and disabled
If the player is not overlapping the next scene zone, make the cards, their docks, and the start button all invisible, and disabled
On the start of the layout, set each card's startPos variables to their x & y positions
When the card is not overlapping a dock and you are not dragging the card, set the card's position to the OG position, and set the docked variable to false
When you drop a card, and it's not overlapping a dock, set the card's docked variable to false
set card dock's to dockable, allowing another card to be placed
Subtract ability cards docked by the card position (one), and set the ability bools to false
Set the card's position to 0
When the card's cardposition is set to 0, reset it's position to the starting position
if the card slot is equal to the card's card position, set the card dock's dockable variable to false
Set the global ability to the ability chosen
Set the global ability to the ability chosen
Set the global ability to the ability chosen
Set the global ability to the ability chosen
When you stop dragging the card, and the card is overlapping a card dock, AND that card dock is dockable, set the card's card position to the card dock's card slot
When you stop dragging the card, and the card is overlapping a card dock, AND that card dock is dockable, set the card's card position to the card dock's card slot
if the card slot is equal to the card's card position, set the card dock's dockable variable to false
Set the global ability to the ability chosen
Set the global ability to the ability chosen
Set the global ability to the ability chosen
When the card is not overlapping a dock and you are not dragging the card, set the card's position to the OG position, and set the docked variable to false
When you drop a card, and it's not overlapping a dock, set the card's docked variable to false
set card dock's to dockable, allowing another card to be placed
Subtract cards docked by the card position (one), and set the bools to false
Set the card's position to 0
When the card's cardposition is set to 0, reset it's position to the starting position
